com.brightcove.player.view

Class BrightcoveTextureVideoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.brightcove.player.view.BaseVideoView
            • com.brightcove.player.view.BrightcoveTextureVideoView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, android.widget.MediaController.MediaPlayerControl, Component
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BrightcoveExoPlayerTextureVideoView

    public class BrightcoveTextureVideoView
extends BaseVideoView
    BrightcoveTextureVideoView extends the BaseVideoView using a TextureView based RenderView.
